subject: Economy
question_en: What is the largest share of GST (Goods and Services Tax) revenue in India held by which state?
question_hi: भारत में GST (वस्त्रों aur सेवाओं के विभिन्न पहल कौन सी राज्य में होती है?
explanation_en: Uttar Pradesh and Tamil Nadu together hold a significant share of GST revenue in India. However, Andhra Pradesh stands out as having the largest individual share.
explanation_hi:
